EmailTemplate.name: ICR Withdraw To SME Record Owner
EmailTemplate.subject: {!IMPL-XXXX} Status changed to Withdrawn for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please note that {!record.number} you are assigned to has been automatically declined since the {!IMPL-XXXXXL} it is attached to is withdrawn.
Please refer to the ICR comments and/or the email in the attachments for withdrawal reasons.
